description: The regular paper-folding (or dragon curve) sequence.
references: G. Melancon, Factorizing infinite words using Maple, MapleTech journal, vol. 4, no. 1, 1997, pp. 34-42, esp. p. 36.
links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Index entries for sequences obtained by enumerating foldings
formula: Set a=2, b=1, S(0)=a, S(n+1) = S(n)aF(S(n)), where F(x) reverses x and then interchanges a and b; sequence is limit S(infinity).a(4n) = 2, a(4n+2) = 1, a(2n+1) = a(n).
crossrefs: See A014577 for more references and more terms.
The following are all essentially the same sequence: A014577, A014707, A014709, A014710, A034947, A038189, A082410. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 27 2012
